humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report provides the size of the largest tumor, which is invasive ductal carcinoma measuring 2.2 cm in greatest dimension. Based on the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, it is mentioned that the 'size of tumor: maximum dimension invasive component: 2.2 cm.' This indicates that the size of the tumor is greater than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm, which falls under the T2 category. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
